backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, stores, products, orders, reviews, terms content, and access-control helpers with authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new user profile format and initializing empty terms content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, auth guards, role redirects, profile setup, PIN unlock, and terms acceptance flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin UI panel to view and edit customer and store-owner terms, with save operations and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button that navigates users back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Guides users through creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN and optionally enabling biometric authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Provides a multi-field form for creating a user profile and optionally bootstrapping a super admin account.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Handles unlocking the app via biometrics or a 4‑digit PIN, falling back to PIN if biometric auth fails.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation links based on role, header, footer, theme toggle, and logout flow.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages theme state (light, dark, system) and applies resolved theme to the document root.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Implements enabling and verifying biometric authentication using WebAuthn with local storage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including storing identity, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Implements a local PIN system using hashed storage and session-based unlock state with helpers to set, verify, lock, and unlock.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors to fetch and mutate profiles, terms, stores, orders, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Admin dashboard showing store, customer, order, and revenue stats with analytics views and store block/unblock actions.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Login page for specific user roles using Internet Identity and redirects once authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Customer shopping cart page displaying items grouped by store with quantity controls and navigation to checkout or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Handles checkout flow including cart display, payment method selection, PIN/biometric auth, and submitting orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Displays customer dashboard with navigation cards linking to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Shows searchable, filterable marketplace products and lets users add discounted items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays details for a specific order including items, store info, status, and special notes.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists user orders separated into active and completed tabs with navigation to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Simple form allowing users to enter a store ID and navigate to the store’s product page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Shows store info, ratings, and product list, with ability to add in‑stock items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Displays a searchable and filterable list of stores, allowing customers to navigate to a selected store’s page.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Provides product management for a store, including creating, editing, deleting, and viewing low-stock items.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Shows store orders grouped by status and allows owners to update order progress.
Lists the owner's stores and provides navigation to store inventory, orders, settings, and registration.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Form interface for owners to register a new store with basic details.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Allows owners to view and update existing store details such as name, category, and location.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Displays terms content, lets users confirm acceptance, and submits acceptance before redirecting based on role.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items per store with add, remove, update, clear, and total‑calculation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides functions to aggregate orders into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue and count statistics.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utilities for formatting prices and calculating effective and line‑item totals with discounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates display names and initials from a user profile object.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: WebAuthn utilities for availability checks and creating or retrieving authentication credentials.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing PrimePost’s architecture, features, and requirements.
